abstract: Number of samples in the sample buffer.
overview:
## Discussion

This value is always equal to `sampleProperties.count`. This value is 0 when `Content` is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/DynamicContent] and [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMReadySampleBuffer/contentType] is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/ContentType-swift.enum/markerOnly]. For all other sample buffer content, this value is greater than 0.

# sampleCount

**Instance Property**

Number of samples in the sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var sampleCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is always equal to `sampleProperties.count`. This value is 0 when `Content` is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/DynamicContent] and [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMReadySampleBuffer/contentType] is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/ContentType-swift.enum/markerOnly]. For all other sample buffer content, this value is greater than 0.
title: sampleCount
